Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the capabilities of the app by stating that it asks personal questions and takes photos without any notice.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide sufficient evidence or support to prove that the app actually asks personal questions and takes photos.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the app is a threat to children based on a Facebook post, without verifying the accuracy of the information.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert's verdict suggests that the app does not actually take users' photos and Angela can only ask questions if prompted by the user. This presents an alternative explanation to the claim's assertion.
